DESCRIPTION: Skip forward a number of turns. Your powers, relics, and cards trigger, but block and enemies are unchanged. You do not replenish Energy or discard/draw cards.
Cards with #yForget effects are #yEthereal. Their #yForget effect triggers when they #yExhaust due to being #yEthereal.
At the end of your turn, deal damage to the enemy with the greatest HP and lose #b1 #yWither.
Additional card text that persists until the card is played. #yBlessings cannot be applied to Curses, Statuses, or any card with an identical #yBlessing .
At the end of your turn, gain #yBlock. Receiving unblocked attack damage reduces #yPlated #yArmor by #b1.
